title: Person of Interest - Root & Shaw defend Finch (05x10)
author: POI - Best Of
comment: Root probably only delivered this whole "shape speech" so she could bring her "And darling, you got a great shape" line xD

"She wanted you to know, that if you were a shape, you were a straight line. An arrow.."

Great. Now I'm getting sad again.
Re-watch it now and I feel heart-broken again. Root shouldn't be dead.
510: No time like the present, Sameen. 411: There is no time like the present, Sameen.
description:
- Extract from season 5 episode 10
